Trader Herbiel:

Nothing special, a few jewels and a Scroll of Escape. I have some advice for you. If you have a Soulshot Ticket, you can exchange it for Soulshots or Spiritshots through the Game Assistant. To do so, open the Items menu and look there for Soulshots/ Spiritshots. I hope you'll find this information useful.

By the way, I've heard some talks that Captain Bathis in Gludio needs help with something... Are you interested?
